extendedIngredients.name: potatoes
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3 medium potatoes, peeled and thinly sliced

recipes.title: Easy Au Gratin Potatoes
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a large saucepan, bring cream, milk, salt and garlic powder to a boil. Add potatoes; reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Coarsely crush 1/4 cup of croutons. Remove potatoes from the heat. Gently stir in the crushed croutons and pepper.                                                                                            Pour into a greased 1-1/2-qt. baking dish. Sprinkle with cheese and remaining croutons. Bake, uncovered, at 400° for 5-6 minutes or until the cheese is melted.                                        Yield: 4 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Easy Au Gratin Potatoes in  Taste of Home Meals in Minutes CalendarAnnual 1997, p1                                                                                                                                                                                                         Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving (3/4 cup) equals 269 calories, 11 g fat (7 g saturated fat), 42 mg cholesterol, 544 mg sodium, 32 g carbohydrate, 2 g fiber, 9 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a large saucepan, bring cream, milk, salt and garlic powder to a boil.
Add potatoes; reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Coarsely crush 1/4 cup of croutons.
Remove potatoes from the heat. Gently stir in the crushed croutons and pepper.
Pour into a greased 1-1/2-qt. baking dish. Sprinkle with cheese and remaining croutons.
Bake, uncovered, at 400° for 5-6 minutes or until the cheese is melted.
